org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.flownode
Interface TaskDefinition

All Superinterfaces:
ActivityDefinition, BaseElement, BonitaObject, DescriptionElement, FlowNodeDefinition, NamedElement, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
AutomaticTaskDefinition, HumanTaskDefinition, ManualTaskDefinition, ReceiveTaskDefinition, SendTaskDefinition, UserTaskDefinition
All Known Implementing Classes:
AutomaticTaskDefinitionImpl, HumanTaskDefinitionImpl, ManualTaskDefinitionImpl, ReceiveTaskDefinitionImpl, SendTaskDefinitionImpl, TaskDefinitionImpl, UserTaskDefinitionImpl
public interface TaskDefinition
extends ActivityDefinition

A Task is an atomic Activity within a Process flow. A Task is used when the work in the Process cannot be broken down to a finer level of detail. Generally, an end-user and/or applications are used to perform the Task when it is execute

Author:
Baptiste Mesta
